title: ‘He’s a Born Competitor’: Tadej Pogačar to Remain Hungry, despite Runaway Success of 2024
content:
No risk of complacency for Slovenian star: ‘He has always been one of the best in motivating himself, finding new goals’

Read the full article at ‘He’s a Born Competitor’: Tadej Pogačar to Remain Hungry, despite Runaway Success of 2024 on Velo.
author: sstokes
